feature.description: As a test script writer I want to use tap method to simulate user tapping or clicking an object, so that I can test the MobyBehaviour::QT::Widget behaviour

scenario.description: Testing tap method with optional argument 'tap_params' (Rename this to be more descriptive)
scenario.step: I launch application [APPLICATION_NAME] as @app NOT RUN

scenario.description: Testing tap method with optional argument 'interval' (Rename this to be more descriptive)
scenario.step: I launch application [APPLICATION_NAME] as @app NOT RUN

scenario.description: Testing tap method with optional argument 'button' (Rename this to be more descriptive)
scenario.step: I launch application [APPLICATION_NAME] as @app NOT RUN
